formalpara.title: GLIBC support for Hexagon V5
formalpara.para: A bug in GLIBC has been fixed that caused the dynamic linker to incorrectly reject programs and shared libraries compiled for the Hexagon V5 Architecture.

formalpara.title: pthread_mutex_timedlock bug fix
formalpara.para: GLIBC's pthread_mutex_timedlock function has been fixed to return ETIMEDOUT instead of EINVAL for certain timeout values.

formalpara.title: sem_timedwait bug fix
formalpara.para: GLIBC's sem_timedwait function no longer corrupts the semaphore's internal state in presence of invalid values for the timeout.

formalpara.title: EGLIBC version 2.15
formalpara.para: &csl_prod; for &csl_target_name; now includes EGLIBC version 2.15 library which is based on GNU C Library version 2.15. For more information about changes, see http://www.eglibc.org/news#eglibc_2_15.

formalpara.title: strstr and strcasestr bug fixes
formalpara.para: A problem has been fixed that caused GLIBC's strstr and strcasestr functions to return wrong results on certain inputs.

formalpara.title: Optimized string and memory functions
formalpara.para: The performance of GLIBC's string and memory functions, including strstr and memmem, have been significantly improved for large inputs.

formalpara.title: popen bug fix
formalpara.para: GLIBC's popen function no longer causes a deadlock situation when invoked from more than one thread.
